WorkItem.Description:
This is a VS issue, not a TS problem:
If you right-click on a member variable in a .ts file, you can select Refactor->Rename to rename all instances of the selected variable. However, this does not work for member variables which have been defined in the class's constructor:

class MyClass( public name: string ) { ... }

Refactoring the variable string does only rename this instance but not any other instances. Tested in VS 2012 Express for the Web with the TS plug-in.
WorkItem.Summary: VS: Can't refactor member variables defined in the class's constructor
